DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine efficacy CDP870 treat RA signs/symptoms patient partial responder MTX . Other purpose show additional efficacy without increase toxicity immunogenic response CDP870 combine CDP870 MTX therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety CDP870 Methotrexate Compared Methotrexate Alone Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
